title: Compare spacing patterns of red and blue light

content.prompt: At separate times, red light and blue light pass through the same two narrow slits, and each forms an interference pattern on the screen represented above. How do the spacings of the bright fringes in the two patterns compare?

choices.label: The red fringes are spaced farther apart than the blue fringes are.
The blue fringes are spaced farther apart than the red fringes are.
The fringes have the same spacing in both patterns.
The patterns cannot be compared without knowing the slit separation.
The patterns cannot be compared without knowing the distance from the slits to the screen.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
